name: TheGoldenMacGuffin
0:
”Alexa open The Golden MacGuffin”
”Begin”
”go in first”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the golden macguffin
des:
An Alexa Skill for children 10 and over! Tey Shawn goes on an adventure with his friends to find the golden MacGuffin! In doing so, he'll accomplish his mission of becoming a great intrepid explorer and space pirate just like his father! Ready to follow along? Find your nearest Amazon Echo Show, any Alexa-enabled device, or use echosim.io, and say: Open the Golden MacGuffin!

This skill is an interactive adventure game for anyone who loves loves all things science fiction, fantasy, and adventure!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
